flawed_nl_solution:
Machine A can put caps on 12 x 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 bottles in 10 minutes.
Machine B can put caps on 12 - 2 = <<12-2=10>>10 bottles in 1 minute.
So in 10 minutes, machine B can put caps on 10 x 10 = <<10*10=100>>100 bottles.
Machine c can put caps on 10 + 5 = <<10+5=15>>15 bottles in 1 minute.
So in 10 minutes, machine C can put caps on 15 x 10 = <<15*10=105>>105 bottles.
Therefore, the three machines can put caps on 120 + 100 + 105 = <<120+100+105=325>>325 bottles in 10 minutes.
#### 325

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
